item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Finally I got pure Chinese desktop, yeah!
However, I forgot what else I installed there :( anyway, again install openssh server, ffmpeg, sbcl, plus some freeware (non open source) from Real/Adobe, should be enough for now.
item.content:encoded:
Finally I got pure Chinese desktop, yeah!

However, I forgot what else I installed there üôÅ anyway, again install openssh server, ffmpeg, sbcl, plus some freeware (non open source) from Real/Adobe, should be enough for now.
